responsibilities: Annotate and label data according to specified guidelines and criteria
Ensure the accuracy and consistency of labeled data
Perform QA/QC functions to improve data quality
Oversee the implementation, maintenance, and optimization of the data labeling SDK
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements
Report any issues or inconsistencies encountered during the labeling process
Work with data labeling tools and platforms to efficiently label data
Support machine learning and software engineering projects during periods of low data labeling activity
qualifications: Strong attention to detail and the ability to maintain high levels of accuracy
Basic understanding of data labeling concepts and techniques
analysis: The job responsibilities primarily focus on data annotation and labeling, ensuring data quality, and collaborating with cross-functional teams. The skills required include attention to detail, understanding of data labeling concepts, communication skills, and Python programming experience. There is no explicit mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The job seems to be more about supporting machine learning projects through data preparation rather than directly involving GenAI or LLMs.
